remarks: Shifting a bit sequence to the left (toward the more significant bits) causes the number to be multiplied by a power of two.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2016.)
statement:
bitsshft $p |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ N e. NN0 ) -> { n e. NN0 | ( n - N ) e. ( bits ` A ) } = ( bits ` ( A x. ( 2 ^ N ) ) ) ) $.
$d A n $.
$d N n $.
